title: Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Northeast Arc (Danvers, MA) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: It went well was brought to a nice office and sat down with the program director and they asked some questions about what company’s I worked in the past. They asked some resume questions to see what else you have done in the past.
Interview Questions: How did you hear about us?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Northeast Arc (Danvers, MA) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: My interview went pretty well but  only have one thing to point out , they didn’t indicate on their job ad that they don’t hire new grads without pediatrics experience, came to know about it during the phone interview.
Interview Questions: Do you have experience working with pediatrics patients?

title: ABA Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Northeast Arc (Danvers, MA) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Interview was easy. Had common questions related to what stated in resume. Questions such as how many years I worked at a job and what responsibilities did I have for each.

title: ABA Therapist (Building Blocks Program) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Northeast Arc (Danvers, MA) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: I met with two of the assistant directors at their main office in Danvers. The parking was tough, even though they had two large lots, I had to park down the street because both lots were full. Our interview took place in a comfortable community room right next to the lobby and the interviewers were both very nice and informative. They started off asking me questions about myself and why I was interested in the position. After that, the interview transitioned to a conversational tone in which they thoroughly explained how the program worked. The interview lasted approximately an hour. I would suggest arriving at least 20 minutes early because parking was difficult to find.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with a child who is often overstimulated and has trouble paying attention?

title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Northeast Arc (Danvers, MA) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: met with controller and supervisor. they went over what was to be expected of me and they asked what slary I was looking for. they gave me a number I would get when they officially hired me and it ended up being 3,000.00 a year short of what they said

title: Skills Trainer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Northeast Arc (Danvers, MA) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Two interviews. Normal stuff. First interview was in person with senior skills trainer and team lead. Second interview was with assistant director and director of PCA program. Both interviews took place in a conference room located close to their lobby. It took about two weeks to get hired.
Interview Questions: How do you feel about traveling.

title: Autism Service Provider Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Northeast Arc (Danvers, MA) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions:
Given case scenarios, I was asked how I would respond; 
The interviewer asked about three different scenarios. 
I was asked about my experiences and my strengths and weaknesses. 
I was also able to ask some questions about the company.
Interview Questions: What would you do when a client is in ________ situation?
